description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Chu's Dynasty combines the strategic fighting of street-fighter with the multi-tiered 4 player fighting mayhem of super-smash brothers.  Chu's then adds a new twist to the genre with time manipulation.  Fight through four campaigns and learn how the gods where born. Fight with up to 4 players in free for all and team modes. Control Time and Space with each of the characters unique time powers.
